name: Masha and the Bear: Car Games
name_original: Masha and the Bear: Car Games
description:
Toddler's races with the heroes of the popular cartoon "Masha and the Bear". Choose your vehicle and rush to find lost sweets. Uphill climb in an amazing story with Masha from Indigo Kids!

Our Masha has lost all the candies, and now the children will have to help them gather in our amazing race game. They are scattered all over the forest, which you are to be reached by the various of transport. Will we have time to collect all the candies while Masha, Bear didn’t run out of energy in our game for children? Overcome all obstacles with heroes and other animals in our “Driving Lessons” game! Do not you know yet what type of transport to choose in bumpy road games?
There is a big choice in our game! Here are a bike, Masha’s 3-wheel bike, and trailer, you are only to decide - with whom you will go together in “Masha and the Bear” game. Let’s ride!

A pleasant surprise for you - the longer you go, the more candies you will be able to take with you! And at the end of each site in our game for kids you will receive a special gift - a large chest with candies! How much candies you can collect? :)
Are your kids ready to cope with dangerous and various road sections in hill racing game? You will have to try to drive through the field of sunflowers, forest, snow and pond without incident in Indigo Kids Masha and the Bear game. How fast you can reach finish line?

Careful parents can not worry about the pastime of the child our game “Masha and the Bear: Driving lesson”! Started playing funny game with Masha, Bear the toddlers will take over for a long time, and you can safely rest from the bustle. We have prepared for you an application, of the popular hill climb games, car racing games for and hill racing games, in which the children will improve mindfulness, visual memory, intelligence and logical skills!
Interesting tasks and an accessible interface are more relevant than ever! What else is exciting for you in our amazing game?
our games for boys and girls that are fit for children aged from 2 to 9 years;
favorite and Interesting games with Masha’s voiceover;
like other Indigo Kids games “Driving lesson” give your child unlimited abilities for creation and fun;
racing games for kids with the heroes of the famous cartoon, where Masha and Bear fully accompanies the player and teaches him;
awesome Masha and the Bear games with the ability to show to friends and play with them;
games for kids improve visual memory and help children to learn ingredients;
explore Masha’s world with favorite characters;
unique levels, lots of fun and entertaining situations will not let you get bored!

Indigo Kids is a real world of mini-games for clever kids! We believe that knowledge received from our free car games for kids is absorbed quickly and permanently. Our goal is to provide parents the confidence that the time spent by their kid will be an additional source of new discoveries and will teach him useful skills. Our applications are specially made for toddlers from 2 till 9 years old.
